original_title: Many more to join UNP soon: Ruwan
original_body_lines: There will be new faces who will join the UNP soon, UNP Deputy Leader Ruwan Wijewardene said today.

"We now have Ministers Harin Fernando and Manusha Nanayakkara with us. Some others will also join us. There will be new faces in the UNP soon," Mr. Wijewardene said addressing the UNP May Day rally at Sugathadasa Stadium today. (Yohan Perera)
